google-description: What prompted us to leave everything behind to live abroad? In this article, we give you different reasons why you might decide to move abroad, whether for professional or personal reasons. We try to explain each reason as well as possible based on our own experience.
social-network-description: Every year, thousands of people decide to move to another country… But what is the trigger? What made us decide to leave everything behind to live abroad? And what is the difference with a simple trip?
quote: Every year, thousands of people decide to move to another country… But what is the trigger? What made us decide to leave everything behind to live abroad? And what is the difference with a simple trip?

section1.part7: « Life opens up opportunities to you, and you either take them or you stay afraid of taking them. »

section2.part6: « If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his language, that goes to his heart. »

section4.part7: « To travel (or to expatriate) is to love to discover and learn, to realize that cultures are all beautiful and rich. »

section7.part7: « Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things you didn't do than by the ones you did. So throw off the bowlines, sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. »

section8.part5: « One of the most difficult things is not to change society – but to change yourself. »

section10.part7: « The biggest risk in life is not taking one. Get out of your comfort zone and do something new. »

pinterest: Live my life as an expatriate. In this article, we try to answer a recurring question we receive: What prompted us to move abroad? And what are our tips for a successful expatriation?

facebook.part2: We never really knew what to answer to the following question: Why did you move abroad? Because for us it was obvious, but given how many people asked us, we have tried our best to answer you in this new article on our life as an expatriate.
